fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose a player. You will haul them off into the jail of any Jailor-type roles that exist in the game (This may cause them to have multiple people jailed at once.) If there are no Jailor-type roles in the game, the selected player will instead be hauled off into a jail identical to Jailor (51)'s jail, but there will be no Jailor for them to interact with.
- At night, attack another player. If the player you attack is in jail, you will kill them, ignoring their defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You cannot be jailed. If someone attempts to jail you, you will learn their name and role at the beginning of the night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
